languages.text: "Лишь познавший путь нашей обители достоин даров. Пройди по тропе просвещенных, впитай их вековечную мудрость и спой со мной вновь". {n}Экран разочарованно угасает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Лишь познавший путь нашей обители достоин даров. Пройди по тропе просвещенных, впитай их вековечную мудрость и спой со мной вновь". {n}Экран разочарованно угасает.{/n}

languages.text: "Only one who has learned the path of our Cenobium is worthy of its gifts. Walk the path of the enlightened, absorb their age-old wisdom, and sing with me again." {n}The screen goes dark in disappointment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лишь познавший путь нашей обители достоин даров. Пройди по тропе просвещенных, впитай их вековечную мудрость и спой со мной вновь". {n}Экран разочарованно угасает.{/n}

"Only one who has learned the path of our Cenobium is worthy of its gifts. Walk the path of the enlightened, absorb their age-old wisdom, and sing with me again." {n}The screen goes dark in disappointment.{/n}

languages.text: "Nur, wer den Pfad unseres Cenobiums gelernt hat, ist dessen Gaben würdig. Beschreitet den Pfad der Erleuchteten, saugt ihre uralte Weisheit auf, und singt erneut mit mir." {n}Der Bildschirm schaltet sich enttäuscht ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only one who has learned the path of our Cenobium is worthy of its gifts. Walk the path of the enlightened, absorb their age-old wisdom, and sing with me again." {n}The screen goes dark in disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nur, wer den Pfad unseres Cenobiums gelernt hat, ist dessen Gaben würdig. Beschreitet den Pfad der Erleuchteten, saugt ihre uralte Weisheit auf, und singt erneut mit mir." {n}Der Bildschirm schaltet sich enttäuscht ab.{/n}

languages.text: « Seul celui qui a appris la voie de notre Cenobium est digne de ses dons. Suivez la voie des éclairés, absorbez leur antique sagesse et chantez à nouveau avec moi. » {n}L'écran s'éteint, manifestement déçu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only one who has learned the path of our Cenobium is worthy of its gifts. Walk the path of the enlightened, absorb their age-old wisdom, and sing with me again." {n}The screen goes dark in disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Seul celui qui a appris la voie de notre Cenobium est digne de ses dons. Suivez la voie des éclairés, absorbez leur antique sagesse et chantez à nouveau avec moi. » {n}L'écran s'éteint, manifestement déçu.{/n}

languages.text: “只有领悟了我们哲学之道的朝圣者，才配得上这件礼物。重新踏上启蒙者的道路，汲取前人古老的智慧，再度和我一起歌唱吧。”{n}思考着的话语中充满了失望，屏幕也黯淡下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only one who has learned the path of our Cenobium is worthy of its gifts. Walk the path of the enlightened, absorb their age-old wisdom, and sing with me again." {n}The screen goes dark in disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “只有领悟了我们哲学之道的朝圣者，才配得上这件礼物。重新踏上启蒙者的道路，汲取前人古老的智慧，再度和我一起歌唱吧。”{n}思考着的话语中充满了失望，屏幕也黯淡下来。{/n}

languages.text: 「我々連生体の道を習得した者だけが、その贈り物に相応しい。悟りを開きし者の道を歩み、彼らの古くからの知恵を吸収して、再び共に唱えるのだ」{n}失望した様子でスクリーンは暗くなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only one who has learned the path of our Cenobium is worthy of its gifts. Walk the path of the enlightened, absorb their age-old wisdom, and sing with me again." {n}The screen goes dark in disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々連生体の道を習得した者だけが、その贈り物に相応しい。悟りを開きし者の道を歩み、彼らの古くからの知恵を吸収して、再び共に唱えるのだ」{n}失望した様子でスクリーンは暗くなった。{/n}

languages.text: «Solo quien ha aprendido el camino de nuestro Cenobio es digno de sus dones. Recorre el camino de los iluminados, absorbe su sabiduría milenaria y vuelve a cantar conmigo». {n}La pantalla se oscurece de decepción.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only one who has learned the path of our Cenobium is worthy of its gifts. Walk the path of the enlightened, absorb their age-old wisdom, and sing with me again." {n}The screen goes dark in disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Solo quien ha aprendido el camino de nuestro Cenobio es digno de sus dones. Recorre el camino de los iluminados, absorbe su sabiduría milenaria y vuelve a cantar conmigo». {n}La pantalla se oscurece de decepción.{/n}

languages.text: "Yalnızca Senobiyumumuza açılan yolun öğretisine nail olanlar, onun hediyelerine layıktır. Aydınlananın yolundan yürü, asırlar devirmiş bilgeliklerini kavra ve ilahiyi benimle birlikte bir kez daha söyle." {n}Ekran, hayal kırıklığıyla kararıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only one who has learned the path of our Cenobium is worthy of its gifts. Walk the path of the enlightened, absorb their age-old wisdom, and sing with me again." {n}The screen goes dark in disappointment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca Senobiyum'umuza açılan yolun öğretisine nail olanlar, onun hediyelerine layıktır. Aydınlananın yolundan yürü, asırlar devirmiş bilgeliklerini kavra ve ilahiyi benimle birlikte bir kez daha söyle." {n}Ekran, hayal kırıklığıyla kararıyor.{/n}
